title: Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, Pair up to 100 Speakers,IPX7 Waterproof Speaker Wireless Bluetooth-V5.3, HiFi Stereo Sound, 1100mins Playtime, Portable Speaker for Home, Outdoor, Party
descriptions:
Introducing the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, the ultimate portable speaker for all your audio needs. With its cutting-edge features and sleek design, this speaker is sure to impress.

Pair up to 100 Speakers:
With the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers, you can connect up to 100 speakers for an immersive audio experience like no other. Whether you're throwing a party or setting up a home theater system, these speakers are perfect for any occasion.

IPX7 Waterproof Rating:
Don't let water ruin your fun! The Raymate Bluetooth Speakers are IPX7 waterproof, so you can take them to the pool, beach, or even in the shower without worrying about damage. Let the music flow wherever you go.

Bluetooth-V5.3 Technology:
Experience seamless connectivity with the latest Bluetooth-V5.3 technology. Connect your devices effortlessly and enjoy a stable connection for uninterrupted music playback.

HiFi Stereo Sound:
Immerse yourself in rich and vibrant sound with the HiFi Stereo sound quality of the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers. Feel every beat and enjoy crystal-clear audio that will enhance your listening experience.

1100 Minutes Playtime:
With a whopping 1100 minutes of playtime, you can enjoy non-stop music all day long. Whether you're at home, outdoors, or hosting a party, the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers will keep the music going.

Portable and Versatile:
Take your music anywhere with the portable design of the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers. Its cylindrical body with pure colors and golden ratio design will complement any space. It's perfect for home use, outdoor adventures, or parties.

Integrated Turntable Button:
Control your music with ease using the integrated turntable button. Adjust the volume, skip tracks, and pause/play your favorite tunes with just a simple touch. Enjoy a seamless and hassle-free user experience.

Advanced Audio Technology:
The Raymate Bluetooth Speakers feature dual speaker drivers and a powerful amplifier module, delivering a balanced sound without distortion. Experience music the way it was meant to be heard.

Integrated Structure:
Designed to withstand the elements, the integrated structure of the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers provides protection against rain, dust, snow, and splashes. Enjoy your music worry-free, no matter the environment.

Long Battery Life:
The Raymate Bluetooth Speakers are powered by a 3600mAh battery, providing more than 15 hours of playtime. Say goodbye to frequent recharging and enjoy uninterrupted music for hours on end.

Type C Charging Port:
Charging your speaker is quick and convenient with the Type C charging port. No more fumbling with cables, simply plug in and recharge in no time.

Upgrade your audio experience with the Raymate Bluetooth Speakers. Get yours today and enjoy a world of immersive sound, portability, and versatility.

Balanced Sound Without Distortion: Enjoy perfectly balanced sound without any distortion. The Raymate Bluetooth Speakers ensure that every note is delivered with precision, so you can enjoy your music as the artist intended.

Golden Ratio Cylindrical Body with Pure Colors: Not only do these speakers sound amazing, but they also look stunning. The golden ratio cylindrical body and pure colors make them a stylish addition to any space.

3600mAh Battery Capacity: With a large 3600mAh battery capacity, these speakers offer more than 15 hours of playtime. Say goodbye to frequent charging and enjoy uninterrupted music for hours on end.

Type C Charging Port: Charging your speakers is now more convenient than ever with the Type C charging port. Simply plug in and get ready to enjoy your favorite tunes.
